Text: ...Around here?
Yeah, just a little further.

You can't see it clearly from a distance. It seems to
be generating a magic wall that distorts your field
of vision.

You'll see it when we get closer...or rather when we
pass through the wall.

I see. It's probably an optical illusion that works
as a mirage, deflecting information from reaching
your field of view.

Wow, you figured it out just by listening. You're
something else, my lord.
Oh! It's coming into view.
What the...

(A tower ascending to the sky! And look at the
intricate stonework...! This is one giant fantasy
cliché!)

(No doubt it guards some mysterious treasure or
creature! I'm dying to add it to my shadowbroker
collection. Oh...the possibilities...)
(If I had to name it, yes, I'd call it...)

I've never seen a tower like this. I thought you
might know something about it—
...Yggdrasil.
What? "Yggdrasil"...?

I've heard that name before, but I thought it
referred to a giant tree—

Y-You mean to say the giant tree was a metaphor?!
Or that's how it was perceived by the person who
saw it. My own preconceived notions limited me to
seeing it as a tower...
You're incredible, my lord.
Huh? Um...of course.
Let's enter.
Graarrrr...
There are monsters here. Not a bad place to live.

But they don't look much different from the monsters
above ground.
...Huh? Where did Master Shadow go...?

(It may look like a regular tower at a glance, but I
know for a fact...there's always a hidden room
somewhere!)

(There's a faint wind flowing through the tower...
It's coming from here!)
There you are, my lord. Is that...treasure?

Are you saying that people hid things here? It could
be the workings of the Cult...

(Just as I thought. My hunch was correct. There's
hidden treasure here!)
(Hold on, my shadowbroker collection!)
...Let's go.
Yeah...!
